T02D1709a:69b-1: mandala la aa bhi she ka ta bidhi:/
T02D1709a:69b-3: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga / rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1709a:69b-5: rdo rje 'chang gis gang gsungs shing //
T02D1709a:69b-6: bla ma'i man ngag las 'ongs pa'i //
T02D1709a:69b-7: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1709a:69b-8: bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis //
T02D1709a:69b-9: sa rnams sbyang sogs byas nas ni //
T02D1709a:69b-10: khro bo chen po bzlas bya zhing //
T02D1709a:69b-11: cho ga shes pas dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D1709a:69b-12: rab tu drag pa'i gsang sngags dang //
T02D1709a:69b-13: go cha srad bu 'khor lo dang //
T02D1709a:69b-14: dum gcig rdo rje ra ba dang //
T02D1709a:69b-15: rab 'bar me dang khro bos srung //
T02D1709a:69b-16: sa yi lha mo lhag gnas dang //
T02D1709a:69b-17: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D1709a:69b-18: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02D1709a:69b-19: bla ma dam par gsol 'dabs kyis //
T02D1709a:69b-20: bdag gi bla ma mdzad du gsol //
T02D1709a:69b-21: zhes pas mandala dbul ba lan gsum mo //
T02D1709a:69b-22: sems bskyed pa dang gso sbyong dang //
T02D1709a:69b-23: nyi shu bzhi yis sdom pa drug / so shing
T02D1709a:69b-24: dor dang rmi lam brtag / ngan na 'bad pas
T02D1709a:69b-25: de bzlog bya // srad bu mdung pa gsum ldan pa //
T02D1709a:69b-26: gsang sngags bzlas pas lag g-yon la //
T02D1709a:69b-27: legs par bcengs te bsrung bar bya //
T02D1709a:69b-28: sa gzhi bstar bar bcu phyed byugs //
T02D1709a:69b-29: man ngag ldan pas thig gdab bya //
T02D1709a:69b-30: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1709a:69b-31: kun gyi nang rol nag por gnas //
T02D1709a:69b-32: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1709a:69b-33: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1709a:69b-34: 'dod yon la ni lha mo mdzes //
T02D1709a:69b-35: dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02D1709a:69b-36: me long rnga yab rin chen phreng //
T02D1709a:69b-37: padma dur khrod rdo rje dang //
T02D1709a:69b-40: 'dab brgyad kha dog sna tshogs pa //
T02D1709a:69b-42: mdzes pa'i rtsibs bzang bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1709a:69b-43: dbus su zla bar autpala dmar //
T02D1709a:69b-44: 'dab mar thod pa'am dril bu ni //
T02D1709a:69b-45: dkar ljang sngo ser phyogs g-yon skor //
T02D1709a:69b-46: ser dkar dmar sngo mtshams rnams su //
T02D1709a:69b-47: g-yas su skor bzla ba la'o //
T02D1709a:69b-49: bcu gnyis zla bar gnas par bya //
T02D1709a:70a-2: nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa bri //
T02D1709a:70a-3: bsam gtan gyis ni bsam gtan bsgom //
T02D1709a:70a-4: phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi //
T02D1709a:70a-5: mchod pa rim bzhin legs mchod bya //
T02D1709a:70a-6: rdo rjes bltams par byas nas ni //
T02D1709a:70a-7: slob mas gsol ba btab pa la ;
T02D1709a:70a-8: / bla ma'i man ngag gis dbang bskur //
T02D1709a:70a-9: nam mkhar thabs dang shes rab rnams //
T02D1709a:70a-10: snyoms 'jug khu ba la mi bskyod pa'i //
T02D1709a:70a-11: dbur bzhugs rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon //
T02D1709a:70a-12: shes rab padmar lhags gyur te //
T02D1709a:70a-13: nam mkhar spros te dbang bskur ro //
T02D1709a:70a-14: mi bskyod rang bzhin chu yis so //
T02D1709a:70a-15: aom a'a: badzra aud ka tha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D1709a:70a-17: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1709a:70a-18: gsang ba gsum las byung ba yi //
T02D1709a:70a-19: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1709a:70a-20: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po byin //
T02D1709a:70a-21: cod pan rgyal ba lnga bstims te //
T02D1709a:70a-22: mgo bo'i gnas lngar dbang bskur ro //
T02D1709a:70a-23: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D1709a:70a-24: aom sarba satva badzri aa bhi shinytsa br'um /
T02D1709a:70a-25: aom ratna badzri aa bhi shinytsa aa /
T02D1709a:70a-26: aom dharm'a badzri aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D1709a:70a-27: aom sarba bi shva aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02D1709a:70a-28: aom h'um tr'am hr'i aa: sngags 'di dar dbyangs dpral bar bcings /
T02D1709a:70a-29: rin chen 'byung ldan gnas pas so //
T02D1709a:70a-30: 'od dpag med par gnas pa yis //
T02D1709a:70a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D1709a:70a-32: di ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1709a:70a-33: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D1709a:70a-34: shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung //
T02D1709a:70a-35: zhes brjod gnas gsum reg ste sbyin //
T02D1709a:70a-36: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa hri /
T02D1709a:70a-37: rta mchog tu ni gnas pa yis //
T02D1709a:70a-38: aom badzra ghanda aa aa: gri hi so se bha
T02D1709a:70a-39: ga wa na ma ye sanna ni hi to bha
T02D1709a:70a-40: ba ti / g-yon par yongs su gtad par bya //
T02D1709a:70a-41: rtag par rdo rjes gnas pa yis //
T02D1709a:70a-42: rdo rje dril bu mgor bzhag ste //
T02D1709a:70a-43: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra aa bhi she kat /
T02D1709a:70a-44: khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo //
T02D1709a:70a-45: me tog lhung ba'i rjes 'gror brjod //
T02D1709a:70a-46: slob dpon dbang sogs brjod na yang //
T02D1709a:70a-47: kye yi rdo rje ji bzhin brjod //
T02D1709a:70a-48: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bsdus ba
T02D1709a:70a-49: pa ra he ta pandi tas sbyar ba rdzogs so
T02D1709a:70a-51: / // / kha tshe'i pandi ta sam gha shr'i bha dra dang /
